item.title: 捷克亿万富翁克里廷斯基寻求再次将地铁公司私有化
item.description: 亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）在最初的尝试失败五年多后，希望再次将德国批发商麦德龙股份公司私有化。【原文：Billionaire Daniel Kretinsky wants to take German wholesaler Metro AG private again, more than five years after an initial attempt failed.】

item.title: 芯片零部件制造商下调业绩展望，索泰克股价暴跌
item.description: 周四，在汽车行业不断恶化的背景下，半导体零部件制造商索泰克下调了全年业绩展望，索泰克股价创下十年来最大跌幅。【原文：Shares in Soitec plummeted the most in a decade on Thursday after the semiconductor-parts maker cut its full-year outlook amid a worsening car industry.】

item.title: 欧洲股市因盈利乐观超越收盘纪录
item.description: 在与美国的贸易不确定性上升之际，企业盈利保持弹性的乐观情绪推动欧洲股市上涨，突破了历史最高收盘水平。【原文：European stocks rose above their highest closing level on record, boosted by optimism that corporate earnings are remaining resilient at a time of rising trade uncertainties with the US.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚确认卡扎克将重返央行行长岗位
item.description: 拉脱维亚批准马丁斯-卡扎克再次担任央行行长，任期五年，结束了几个月来他在 2024 年底离任时没有继任者的政治内讧。【原文：Latvia approved the return of Martins Kazaks as central-bank governor for another five-year term, ending months of political infighting that saw him leave office without a successor at the end of 2024.】

item.title: 普京出人意料地撤换俄罗斯航天局局长
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）解除了俄罗斯航天局局长的职务，并由另一名官员取而代之，这是对世界最大航天机构之一的一次意外调整。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin dismissed the chief of Roscosmos and replaced him with another official in a surprise shake up at one of the world’s biggest space agencies.】

item.title: Seven & i Consortium 据称将利用美国银行和花旗银行进行收购融资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，提议将 Seven & i Holdings Co. 私有化的财团已向花旗集团和美国银行寻求融资，参与这场可能创下历史纪录的管理层收购竞购的公司越来越多。【原文：The consortium proposing to take Seven & i Holdings Co. private has tapped Citigroup Inc. and Bank of America Corp. for financing, adding to a growing group of players in the potentially record-breaking management buyout bid, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 黑田东彦称日本央行将继续加息，因为通货紧缩已经结束
item.description: 日本央行前行长黑田东彦表示，日本已经 "彻底 "结束了通货紧缩，央行继续加息以实现政策正常化是绝对自然的，他的任期就是超宽松货币政策的任期。【原文：Japan has “completely” ended deflation and it’s absolutely natural for the central bank to proceed with rate hikes to normalize policy, according to former BOJ Governor Haruhiko Kuroda, whose term was defined by ultra easy monetary settings.】

item.title: 沙特 IPO 热潮深化股市多元化
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯为摆脱对石油销售的依赖而制定的经济总体规划正在一个关键领域显现出来：股票发行。从初创科技公司到金融服务公司，纷纷出售股票，使长期由银行和石油化工公司主导的股票市场变得更加多元化。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s economic masterplan to wean its economy off a reliance on oil sales is showing up in one key area: equity offerings. A flurry of share sales by companies from tech startups to financial services firms is diversifying a stock market long dominated by banks and petrochemicals.】

item.title: 财政部长会谈进入最后阶段，黎巴嫩债券重拾涨势
item.description: 由于交易商和当地政治观察家称任命财政部长的谈判已进入最后阶段，黎巴嫩违约主权债券在停滞三周后再次反弹。【原文：Lebanon’s defaulted sovereign bonds are rallying again after a three-week stagnation as traders and local political observers say talks to appoint a finance minister have progressed to the final stage.】

item.title: 匈牙利工业下滑，零售业停滞不前，经济衰退缓慢退出
item.description: 匈牙利 12 月份的工业产值萎缩速度快于预期，零售业停滞不前，这表明匈牙利摆脱去年衰退的步伐将放缓。【原文：Hungary’s industrial output shrank at a faster pace than expected and retail trade stagnated in December, indicating that the exit from last year’s recession was set to proceed slowly.】

item.title: 英美资源集团预计减记戴比尔斯集团资产
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）预计将对其戴比尔斯公司（De Beers）的业务进行减记，因为钻石销售量的急剧下降将促使该公司削减产量。【原文：Anglo American Plc expects to take a writedown on its De Beers business as plunging diamond sales prompt cuts in output.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金希望获得由意大利 Sace 支持的 30 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在与意大利保险公司和出口信贷机构 Sace 就 30 亿欧元（31 亿美元）的贷款担保进行谈判。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in talks with Italian insurer and export credit agency Sace for €3 billion ($3.1 billion) in loan guarantees, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 盎格鲁铂金公司称利润因价格下跌最多下降 52
item.description: 英美铂金公司（Anglo American Platinum Ltd.）称，由于钯和铑的价格下滑，该公司去年的利润下降了 52%。【原文：Anglo American Platinum Ltd. said profit last year fell by as much as 52% after the price of palladium and rhodium slumped.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀率意外跃升至八个月高点
item.description: 瑞典上个月的核心通胀率加速超过预期，可能会抑制市场对瑞典央行进一步降息的预期。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation accelerated more than expected last month, potentially dampening expectations in the market about further interest-rate cuts by the Riksbank.】

item.title: 尽管人工智能支出存疑，东京电子仍计划扩张
item.description: 东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）重申了其年度展望，并概述了建造一座 1,040 亿日元（6.81 亿美元）工厂的计划，这表明该公司预计人工智能支出将持续增长。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. reaffirmed its annual outlook and outlined plans to build a ¥104 billion ($681 million) plant, suggesting it expects sustained AI spending.】

item.title: 德国订单激增，进一步表明工业趋于稳定
item.description: 德国 12 月份的工厂订单激增，这进一步证明了陷入困境的制造业前景可能正在改善。【原文：German factory orders surged in December, adding to evidence that the outlook for the beleaguered sector may be improving.】

item.title: 李明博警告：韩国央行本月降息并非板上钉钉
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）回击了越来越多的关于本月晚些时候降息的猜测，他呼吁迅速采取财政刺激措施，以支撑受到唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税威胁的萎靡不振的经济。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong pushed back against mounting speculation of an interest-rate cut later this month as he called for swift fiscal stimulus to shore up a sputtering economy threatened by Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 英国央行的流动性流失终于再次提升了关键的 SONIA 利率
item.description: 英国最重要的市场利率近一年来首次上升，反映出英格兰银行正在努力从金融体系中抽走过剩的流动性。【原文：The UK’s most important market interest rate is rising for the first time in almost a year, reflecting the Bank of England’s ongoing efforts to drain excess liquidity from the financial system.】

item.title: 斗山在捷克罕见的首次公开募股中以中等价格出售单位股份
item.description: Doosan Enerbility Co.通过首次公开募股出售了其捷克蒸汽轮机部门的股份，定价在目标范围的中间，成为四年多来布拉格最大的新上市公司。【原文：Doosan Enerbility Co. sold a stake in its Czech steam-turbine unit through an initial public offering that was priced at the middle of the target range, becoming the biggest new listing in Prague in more than four years.】

item.title: 保乐力加因中国干邑市场下滑而下调销售预期
item.description: 保乐力加集团（Pernod Ricard SA）下调了今年的销售预期，称中国经济放缓拖累了对马爹利干邑（Martell Cognac）的需求。【原文：Pernod Ricard SA has cut its sales outlook for the year, saying China’s slowdown was weighing on demand for its Martell Cognac.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：预期英国央行降息前英国股市将反弹
钨矿商称客户对中国掐断供应难以置信
item.description: 在中国对钨实施出口管制后，刘易斯-布莱克（Lewis Black）的电话一直响个不停，钨是他的公司开采的一种利基金属，对武器制造至关重要。【原文：The phone has been ringing off the hook for Lewis Black after China imposed export controls on tungsten, a niche metal mined by his firm that’s crucial to weapons manufacturing.】

item.title: 马来西亚称美国关税对芯片制造商影响甚微
item.description: 贸易部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，美国对一些国家征收的新关税对马来西亚半导体产业的影响微乎其微。【原文：New tariffs by the US on some countries will have a minimal impact on Malaysia’s semiconductor industry, according to Trade Minister Zafrul Aziz.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行宣布向投资者支付 17 亿欧元，利润超预期
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）宣布去年向投资者派发 17 亿欧元（18 亿美元），因为法国零售银行业的复苏带动第四季度利润超出预期。【原文：Societe Generale SA announced a €1.7 billion ($1.8 billion) investor payout for last year, as fourth-quarter profit beat expectations driven by a recovery in French retail banking.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯与菲律宾讨论南海 "威慑 "问题
item.description: 面对南海地缘政治的紧张局势，美国国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）在马尼拉与菲律宾国防部长通电话时重申了华盛顿与菲律宾签订共同防御条约的 "坚定 "承诺。【原文：US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth reaffirmed Washington’s “ironclad” commitment to a mutual defense treaty with the Philippines during a call with his counterpart in Manila in the face of geopolitical tensions in South China Sea.】

item.title: 贝森特解读特朗普。这不会是最后一次
item.description:
至少，他们在10年期收益率上的经济策略 让人们不再关注美联储。【原文：

At least their economic strategy on the 10-year yield takes the focus off the Fed.

】

item.title: 泰国在长期拖延后重启央行行长遴选
item.description: 泰国重启了拖延数月的中央银行新主席遴选程序，此前曾试图任命一位前部长担任这一职务，但因其政治背景而未能如愿。【原文：Thailand has restarted a process delayed for several months to select a new chairman for the nation’s central bank after a previous attempt to appoint a former minister to the post failed due to his political links.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁为何让英国头疼不已？
item.description:
在本期《在都市》节目中，我们将探讨共和党的不可预测性如何成为首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的难题。【原文：

On this episode of In the City, we look at how the Republican’s unpredictability is a problem for Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

】
